name: Treasure Fort-2D puzzle & shooting
description:
Treasure Fort is a 2D puzzle platformer and shooting-based game. In this game, you play as MK, a poor ninja who fights his way through the castle to get Treasure. With deadly guns, MK is ready to face menacing traps and enemies who have sworn to protect the Treasure.

Treasure Fort features simple yet addicting gameplay, giving you thrilling moments and an unexpected experience. You can upgrade guns using coins collected from enemies and the environment in order to keep track of the difficulty of the game. Maneuver through traps, lay waste on enemies who try to stop you and get the treasure.

Treasure Fort is a combination of both puzzles and shooting.

At each level, the game consists of both puzzles and killing an enemy. You can buy guns with coins getting from killing an enemy.
